# Zurich Airbnb Analysis

## Data Mining & Predictive Modeling Semester Project

Exploratory analysis and machine learning modeling of 2,500+ Zurich Airbnb listings using regression, classification, and clustering techniques.

[View Full Analysis](/analysis.html){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg}
[Download Reports](/downloads.html){.btn .btn-secondary .btn-lg}

## Project Overview

This semester project applies data mining and statistical modeling to understand the Zurich short-term rental market. We explore:

:::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}

### üìä **Exploratory Analysis**

- 2,529 listings across 10 neighborhoods
- Missing value imputation & data preparation
- Summary statistics & visualizations
- Interactive mapping & text analysis
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}

### üìà **Regression Modeling**

- Multiple linear regression (price prediction)
- R¬≤ = 0.622 (explains 62% of variance)
- Key drivers: capacity, location, reviews
- OLS summary with statistical significance
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}

### üéØ **Classification**

- k-NN: Dishwasher amenity prediction (64% accuracy)
- Decision Trees: Host response time (53% accuracy)
- Transformer NLP: Price quartile from text (65% accuracy)
- Comprehensive model evaluation & comparisons
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}

### üîó **Clustering**

- k-Means segmentation (k=3 optimal)
- Three market segments identified
- Feature engineering & interpretation
- PCA visualization & cluster profiles
:::

::::

## Key Findings

:::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
**Market Segmentation**

Three distinct clusters:

- Budget (CHF 128/night)
- Mid-Range (CHF 168/night)  
- Premium (CHF 245/night)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
**Price Drivers**

Each guest capacity: +CHF 18.45/night  
Premium neighborhood: +CHF 52/night  
Higher reviews: -CHF 0.34/night (quality-budget correlation)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
**Predictability**

Structured features ‚Üí 62% price variance  
Text features ‚Üí 64% quartile accuracy  
Host behavior ‚Üí 53% response time accuracy
:::

::::

## Technical Stack

- **Language**: Python 3.12+
- **Data Processing**: Pandas, NumPy
- **Visualization**: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Folium
- **Modeling**: Scikit-learn, Statsmodels
- **NLP**: Hugging Face Transformers (DistilBERT)
- **Report Generation**: Quarto, Jupyter

---

## About This Project

This is a **student semester project** for METAD 699 (Data Mining). The analysis demonstrates:

- Systematic data exploration & visualization
- Feature engineering & variable selection
- Multiple modeling paradigms (regression, classification, clustering)
- Critical interpretation of model results
- Professional communication of findings

**Data Source**: [Inside Airbnb](http://insideairbnb.com/) - Zurich dataset (publicly available)

**Timeline**: December 2025
